item.description: The town paved an old railroad track and made a delightful walk area.  Afterward, we’ll go for lunch locally at a nice restaurant.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Annette 860-223-7755.  Directions to walk:  I‑84W to Exit 32 (Rt. 10), ramp end turn right, go 1.8 miles, turn right onto Mill Street (Apple Valley Bank on corner), look for Farmington Canal Greenway sign on right, we’ll meet in parking area.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be waiting for you in parking area.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
